typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The minimum stake has to be greater than 0."

arguments.value: The minimum stake has to be greater than 0.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The minimum stake has to be greater than 0."

documentation.text: Convenient method for `msg.sender` to participate in the game.
Fallback function defaults to participating in the game.
Internal function for advancing the pot state.

Retrieving number of participants in the game
 @return Number of participants in the game

Determine the winner of the lottery pot.
 @return Address of the winner

Allowing winner to withdraw money.
 @dev in order to prevent withrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

Allow participant to check his own stake
 @return stake of the `msg.sender` in the pot

Allow participants to withdraw money when contract is rendered disabled
 @dev Also want to check participants are not withdrawing from a pot that have all stakes withdrawn.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The minimum stake has to be greater than 0."

attributes.type: literal_string "The minimum stake has to be greater than 0."
attributes.value: The minimum stake has to be greater than 0.

attributes.text: Convenient method for `msg.sender` to participate in the game.
Fallback function defaults to participating in the game.
Internal function for advancing the pot state.

Retrieving number of participants in the game
 @return Number of participants in the game

Determine the winner of the lottery pot.
 @return Address of the winner

Allowing winner to withdraw money.
 @dev in order to prevent withrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

Allow participant to check his own stake
 @return stake of the `msg.sender` in the pot

Allow participants to withdraw money when contract is rendered disabled
 @dev Also want to check participants are not withdrawing from a pot that have all stakes withdrawn.

params._duration: - The duration of the pot `open` period
params._minStake: - The minimum stake required to join the lottery pot
params._owner: - the owner to be recognized by this contract. Not necessarily `msg.sender` nor `tx.origin` for flexibility.

determineWinner().details: Purposefully make this function allowed to be run by anybody, not just the contract owner.

disableContract().details: Only honor request called from its factory, so only the platform admin should call this method.

returns._0: stake of the `msg.sender` in the pot

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

participantWithdraw().details: Also want to check participants are not withdrawing from a pot that have all stakes withdrawn.

participate(address).details: Note that we also allow an existing participant to add stake into the game.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: Number of participants in the game

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

winnerWithdraw().details: in order to prevent withrawal address is a malicious contract, we use check-effect-interaction pattern inside.

determineWinner().notice: Determine the winner of the pot, actual algorithm is delegated to an internal function

disableContract().notice: Disable this contract. Once a contract is disabled, it cannot be enable back.

myStake().notice: Allow participant to check his own stake

participantWithdraw().notice: Allow participants to withdraw money when contract is rendered disabled

participate().notice: Convenient method for `msg.sender` to participate in the game.

participate(address).notice: For a player to join in the game.

totalParticipants().notice: Retrieving number of participants in the game
